maintenance:
Every Tuesday there is a weekly maintenance to update the game servers.
This is to make sure that the servers are running smoothly and that there are no crashes during the week.
So, the game is not accessible on tuesday morning, until 11am~12pm (there is never a precise opening time, it depends on the number of things to do)
So you have to wait until the end :wink:
(If your game tells you that you don't have the right version it's normal, the new version will be available only after the maintenance)
